metadata.synopsis: Banter between SH and Minthara in Last Light after it has fallen to the Shadow Curse (possibly as an indirect consequence of SH killing Nightsong, but possibly unrelated to this).

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: Gone. Swallowed up by the shadow curse.
1.context: NodeContext: Taken aback at the sight of a former hub, now consumed by the Shadow curse. Can be applicable to either arc - gut reaction.

0.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
0.text: Not before time. They hoped to stand against Ketheric with little more than a trick of the light to protect them.
0.context: NodeContext: Scornful -reflecting on the death of people within the shadow curse

2.speaker: Shadowheart
2.text: Worse - they defied Lady Shar's power, openly. Now they have paid the price.
2.context: NodeContext: Bullish. Arc: SH is loyal to Shar.

3.speaker: Shadowheart
3.text: They were desperate. Nobody deserves this.
3.context: NodeContext: Haunted. Arc: SH has turned from Shar.
